atae/saab0509/P528342
{NA₄}KIŠIB {m}{ITI}AB-a.a Bel GEME₂ SUM-ni {MI₂}DI-mu-i-tu GEME₂-šu₂ ša {m}{ITI}AB-a.a u₂-piš-ma {m}na-nu-nu ina ŠA₃-bi x GIN₂ KU₃.UD il-qi kas-pu gam-mur ta-din MI₂ šu-a-tu za-ar₂-pat la-qi-at tu-u-a-ru de-nu da-ba-bu la-šu man-nu ša ina ur-kiš ina me-ti-me lu-u {m}{ITI}AB-a.a lu-u DUMU.MEŠ-šu₂ lu-u DUMU-DUMU.MEŠ-šu₂ lu-u qur-ub-šu₂ lu-u me-me-ni-šu₂ ša de-nu da-ba-bu TA {m}na-nu-ni TA DUMU.MEŠ-šu₂ TA DUMU-DUMU.MEŠ-šu₂ i-ga-ru-u-ni Aššur Šamaš LUGAL lu EN-de-ni-šu₂ Dannu-Nergal A {m}kun-di-x EN-KU₃.UD-na-še-i IGI {m}ṣi-li-i IGI {m}ṣi-bu-u-a IGI {m}{d}x-ma-la-ka {KUR}a-hi-ha-a.a IGI {m}pi-in-du-u IGI {m}ṣal-mu-MAN-iq-bi IGI {m}U.GUR-MU IGI {m}SUHUŠ-kur-ru {ITI}x UD-11-KAM₂ lim-me EGIR x x x
